physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Constitutional: NAD (No acute distress). Neuro: Alert and oriented x 3. Cardiac: RRR (regular rate and rhythm), NL S1, S2, No MRG (murmur, rub, gallop). Lungs: CTA (clear to auscultation). Abdomen: Soft, appropriate tenderness, no rebound tenderness/guarding. Wounds: Abd lap sites with primary dressing, clean, dry, intact. Extremities: No edema.
